    • update

      public void update​(Answer answer)
      Gets called when of the Controller's observed objects (view) updates its observers, it makes the controller act based on the message that the observee sent
      Specified by:
      update in interface Observer
      Parameters:
      answer - message sent by observed object that tells the controller which method to call

    • initGodsOrContinue

      public void initGodsOrContinue()
      If there are still players with uninitialized gods it initializes them, otherwise it initializes the workers

    • setWorker

      public void setWorker​(int x, int y, char initial)
      Initializes the worker on the tile picked by the player
      Specified by:
      setWorker in interface ControllerView
      Parameters:
      x - x coordinate of the selected tile
      y - y coordinate of the selected tile
      initial - player's initial

    • initWorkerOrContinue

      public void initWorkerOrContinue()
      If there are still players with uninitialized workers it initializes them, otherwise it starts the game

    • executeMoveOrBuild

      public void executeMoveOrBuild​(int posXFrom, int posYFrom, int posXTo, int posYTo)
      Executes a turn step, using a power from a starting tile to a destination tile
      Specified by:
      executeMoveOrBuild in interface ControllerView
      Parameters:
      posXFrom - x coordinate of the starting tile
      posYFrom - y coordinate of the starting tile
      posXTo - x coordinate of the destination tile
      posYTo - y coordinate of the destination tile

    • killPlayer

      public void killPlayer​(char initial)
      Called by ServerSocket when a player disconnects, it deletes the player from the game
      Specified by:
      killPlayer in interface ControllerView
      Parameters:
      initial - initial of the player that needs to be deleted

    • gameContinueOnKillPlayer

      public void gameContinueOnKillPlayer​(boolean isCurrent)
      Called after a player is removed from the game. If there are still players with uninitialized gods, it initializes them. If there are still players with uninitialized workers, it initializes them. Otherwise, it starts the game
      Parameters:
      isCurrent - True if it's the current player
